msg.msgText: imaserver group edit "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver group edit help imaserver group edit "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver group edit "GroupID=msgGroup2" "RemoveGroupMembership=msgGroup1" Configuration items are: GroupID The group ID. Description The new description for the group. AddGroupMembership Add GroupID as a member of this group. RemoveGroupMembership Remove GroupID from this group. NOTES: 1. "GroupID" is a required item. 2. At least one of the following items must be specified: "Description", "AddGroupMembership" or "RemoveGroupMembership". 3. Cannot use both "AddGroupMembership" and "RemoveGroupMembership" in one command line operation. 4. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
